pages.title: Task Queue
pages.text: Ask your companion to perform tasks via AI chat. Tasks are queued and executed in order.$(br2)Available tasks:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Farm Area$() — Harvest, hoe, and replant crops$(li)$(bold)Mine Ores$() — Find and mine ore blocks$(li)$(bold)Strip Mine$() — Tunnel at optimal Y-level$(li)$(bold)Create Mine$() — Full mine with shaft, hub, branches$(li)$(bold)Chop Trees$() — Cut down nearby trees$(li)$(bold)Gather Blocks$() — Collect specific block types

pages.title: More Tasks
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Craft Item$() — Autonomous multi-step crafting$(li)$(bold)Smelt Items$() — Auto-furnace operation$(li)$(bold)Build Structure$() — Walls, floors, shelters$(li)$(bold)Go Fishing$() — Fish at nearby water$(li)$(bold)Deliver Items$() — Deliver to a location$(li)$(bold)Kill Mob$() — Hunt specific mobs$(li)$(bold)Guard Area$() — Patrol and defend$(br2)Use $(thing)!status$() to check progress, $(thing)!cancel$() to stop. Tasks chain via continuations for multi-step plans.
